contentList.content: You twist and harden the Weave into arcane wards, while wading into the thick of battle. Learning Abjuration spells from scrolls only costs you 25g per spell level, not 50.
Your carrying capacity is increased by [1]%.
Spells that cost an action cost a bonus action instead.
Spells that only target 1 creature can target an additional creature.
Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to [1] enemies at once.
Your abilities improve by 2 at Battlemage levels 3, 5, 7, 9, and 11.

Infuse the weapon in your main hand with arcane energy. The weapon becomes magical, preventing it from being disarmed. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage Rolls, and deals an additional [2].
Casting this spell using a 4th or 5th level spell slot will increase the Attack and Damage bonus to [1], and a 6th level spell slot will increase it to [2].
